name: @rakuten-rex/eslint-config-rex-react-component
description: Common eslint config for ReX React Component

scripts.build:patch: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && npm run commit
scripts.build:minor: npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && npm run commit
scripts.build:major: npm --no-git-tag-version version major && npm run commit
scripts.commit: git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m 'New version - v'$npm_package_version

author: ReX React UI Components Library Authors (https://github.com/rakuten-rex/eslint-config-rex-react-component/graphs/contributors)
